attributes.action: Take action against all social service workers concerened in the case of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Action must be taken in the seriously lacking investigation into the abuse of baby P, the social workers concerned should be removed from office, Dr Sabah al Zayyat should be struck off and Sharon Shoesmith: children's services director, should be removed from office immediately. We the undersigned call on the Prime Minister to take affirmative action in this case to prevent the needless deaths of children on the child protection register in this Area.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
